description: Blood donors on the Isle of Man should continue to attend sessions, the health minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Give blood during outbreak, Manx donors urged
title_page: Coronavirus: Give blood during outbreak, Manx donors urged - BBC News
maintext: Mr Ashford said: "We appreciate there may be some concern or reluctance during the current situation, but we can reassure people that the safety of donors and staff is always our number one priority.
